  129. DevOps Engineer (Big Data) ("EPAM Systems, Inc.", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –æ—Ç –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏; –î–ú–° —Å–æ —...

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏–º –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ ‚Äì –æ—Ç –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –∏ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞. –° 1993 –≥–æ–¥–∞ EPAM –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –ø—Ä–∏–¥—É–º—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–µ–Ω—è—é—Ç –º–∏—Ä. –ß—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å, –≤ —á–µ–º —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞, –º—ã —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–º –∑–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è–µ–º –∏—Ö –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —É—á–∏–º—Å—è –∏ –Ω–∞–∫–∞–ø–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç. –£—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –ï–†–ê–ú –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ: –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, —É–Ω–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è–º –∏ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è–º –∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ –æ–±—É—á–∞–µ–º –∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º Big Data.

    –û–ë–Ø–ó–ê–ù–ù–û–°–¢–ò:

    • –í—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (–≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–µ –æ–±—ä–µ–º—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, –≥–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≥–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, –≤–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–Ω—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö);

    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã—Ö –æ–∫—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π, –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∞—Ö (on-premises, cloud, multi-cloud, hybrid);

    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏;

    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–µ–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö;

    • –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ (Docker, kubernetes);

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –±–∞–∑–∞–º–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (ElasticSearch, Cassandra, Clickhouse);

    • –û—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Prometheus / Zabbix / Grafana / ELK;

    • –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º (–∫–∞–∫ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ –≤–µ—Ä–æ—è—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö) –∏ –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –∏—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏;

    • –ö–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å –∑–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –∏–∑ –°–®–ê –∏ –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø—ã;

    –¢–†–ï–ë–û–í–ê–ù–ò–Ø:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω–∂–∏–Ω–∏—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –∏ –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;

    • –ì–ª—É–±–æ–∫–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Linux —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º Bash / Python;

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;

    • –ú–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è –Ω–∞ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º Big Data (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, ElasticSearch);

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ SQL;

    • –†–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫ –æ—Ç B1.

    –ñ–ï–õ–ê–¢–ï–õ–¨–ù–û:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ CI/CD (Jenkins/TeamCity/goCD/Rundeck);

    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∞ Infrastructure as Code (Ansible / Terraform);

    –ú–´ –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–ú:

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É —Å –Ω–æ–≤–µ–π—à–∏–º–∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏ –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π (Life Science, E-commerce, –±–∏–æ–∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞, GameDev, Capital Markets –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö);
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –Ω–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ. –ü—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ 6000+ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∏–≤–µ—Ä–∏-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –ë–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –∫–ª—É–±—ã –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö;
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞—Ö –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª –≤–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤: –º—ã –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑—É–µ–º –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º—å—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∏;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ï–†–ê–ú –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–µ–π (–Ω–∞—à–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤ 11 —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º –≤ 25 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö);
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –æ—Ç –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã, –¥–æ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ;
    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—é —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–∏–π, –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è –π–æ–≥–æ–π –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ. –ê –µ—â–µ –≤—ã —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Å–æ—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è—Ö (—Ñ—É—Ç–±–æ–ª, –±–∞—Å–∫–µ—Ç–±–æ–ª, –≤–æ–ª–µ–π–±–æ–ª) –≤ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–µ –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥;
    • –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ (–∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ).


  130. DevOps engineer (Azure) ("EPAM Systems, Inc.", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø...

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏–º –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ ‚Äì –æ—Ç –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –∏ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞. –° 1993 –≥–æ–¥–∞ EPAM –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –ø—Ä–∏–¥—É–º—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–µ–Ω—è—é—Ç –º–∏—Ä. –ß—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å, –≤ —á–µ–º —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞, –º—ã —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–º –∑–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è–µ–º –∏—Ö –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —É—á–∏–º—Å—è –∏ –Ω–∞–∫–∞–ø–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç. –£—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –ï–†–ê–ú –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ: –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, —É–Ω–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è–º –∏ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è–º –∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ.

    –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—á–∏–∫ - –Ω–µ–º–µ—Ü–∫–∞—è —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–Ω–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è —Ñ–∞—Ä–º–∞—Ü–µ–≤—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –∏ –º–µ–¥–∏–∫–æ-–±–∏–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è, –æ–¥–Ω–∞ –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö —Ñ–∞—Ä–º–∞—Ü–µ–≤—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ.

    –ú—ã –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—Å—è –≤ –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–µ DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ —Å –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç–æ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–º Azure Boards, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç —Å–ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É —Å–ª—É–∂–±—ã Azure Boards –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤.

    –¢–ï–•–ù–û–õ–û–ì–ò–ò, –ò–°–ü–û–õ–¨–ó–û–í–ê–ù–ù–´–ï –í –ü–†–û–ï–ö–¢–ï:

    • –°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã AWS;
    • –°–ª—É–∂–±—ã Azure;
    • Terraform / CloudFormation;
    • Python;
    • GitHub actions;
    • GitLab CI;
    • Artifactory;
    • Nexus.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —ç–∫–æ—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã Azure Boards –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è–º–∏;
    • –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ Azure Boards —Å –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—é—â–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª—É–∂–±–∞–º–∏;
    • –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º;
    • –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã;
    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ self-service –ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª–∞.
    –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è:
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ Azure —Å –∞–∫—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –Ω–∞ Azure Boards –∏ Azure DevOps;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –≤ scrum-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ;
    • –ê–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π B2.
    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É —Å –Ω–æ–≤–µ–π—à–∏–º–∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏ –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π (Life Science, E-commerce, –±–∏–æ–∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞, GameDev, Capital Markets –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö);
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –Ω–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ. –ü—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ 7000+ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∏–≤–µ—Ä–∏-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –ë–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –∫–ª—É–±—ã –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö;
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞—Ö –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª –≤–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤: –º—ã –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑—É–µ–º –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º—å—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∏;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ï–†–ê–ú –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–µ–π (–Ω–∞—à–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤ 11 —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º –≤ 30 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö);
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  131. System Architect –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞–º–∏ (—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ) ("–ö–∞–¥—Ä–æ–≤–æ–µ –∞–≥–µ–Ω—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ê–ª–µ–∫—Å–µ—è –°—É—Ö–æ—Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–∞", –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫) map[currency:USD from:6000 gross:true to:7000] [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤.–í—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å –≥–æ...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è-—Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –¥–ª—è —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏—â–µ—Ç –≤ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞.

    –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–≤—Ü–∞–º –≤ –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω-—Ç–æ—Ä–≥–æ–≤–ª–µ —Ä–µ—à–∞—Ç—å —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—É—é –∑–∞–¥–∞—á—É: —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è—Ç—å –∏ –æ—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–ø–∞—Å—ã –≤ –ª—é–±–æ–º –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–µ. –£–∂–µ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 1000 –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–≤—Ü–æ–≤ –≤ —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ –ê–º–µ—Ä–∏–∫–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—é—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç, –∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è.

    –í—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ –Ω–µ–ø–æ—Å—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤.

    –í—ã –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å –≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–æ–º –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –≤ —à—Ç–∞—Ç–µ –ö–µ–Ω—Ç—É–∫–∫–∏, –°–®–ê.

    –í–∞—à–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏:

    • –°–±–æ—Ä –∏ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ —Ñ–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º —Å —É–ø–æ—Ä–æ–º –Ω–∞ –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∫—É –∏ –≤—ã—è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —É–ª—É—á—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –≤ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–æ–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–µ –∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–µ
    • –°–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å CTO –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä–∞ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏
    • –°–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –∏ DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏ –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —É–ø—Ä–æ—â–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—é –∫–æ–¥–∞), –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—é, —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä—Ç—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ —Å —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–æ–∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç–µ–≥–∏–∏ –∏ –∞–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ü–µ–ª–µ–π
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏ –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤ –≤ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –∏ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π (—Ä–µ–≤—å—é –∫–æ–¥–∞, –ø–∞—Ä–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã)
    –û—Ç –≤–∞—Å –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±—É—é—Ç—Å—è:
    • –û—Ç 5+ –ª–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è
    • –≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è C#, ASP.NET, MVC
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ MS Azure, AWS
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ Docker, Kubernetes
    • –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Å JS-—Ñ—Ä–µ–π–º–≤–æ—Ä–∫–∞–º–∏ AngularJS –∏ ReactJS
    –û–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã:
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞/–Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤
    • –û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ (B2+)

    –ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:

    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ CSS —Ñ—Ä–µ–π–º–≤–æ—Ä–∫–æ–≤ (Bootstrap), –ø—Ä–µ–ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä–æ–≤ (SASS –∏–ª–∏ LESS), –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫ (jQuery)
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Hashicorp
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–æ–º –≤–µ–±/–º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ Agile-–ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω–¥—É—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–∏ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—Ü–∏–∏, —Å–∫–ª–∞–¥—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ö–æ–∑—è–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏/–∏–ª–∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∑–∞–ø–∞—Å–∞–º–∏
    • –ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –≤—ã—Å—à–µ–µ –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ (–∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞, –º–∞—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞, –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–µ)

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç:

    • –ó–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω—É—é –ø–ª–∞—Ç—É –æ—Ç 6000 USD –≥—Ä–æ—Å—Å –≤ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞
    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫
    • –¢—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ø–æ –ò–ü
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏–¥–µ–π
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –≤ –æ–ø—ã—Ç–Ω–æ–π –∏ –∞–º–±–∏—Ü–∏–æ–∑–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ
    • –ë–æ–Ω—É—Å—ã


  132. Senior System Architect (Unix/Linux, DevOps, POS, Public Clouds) ("ICL Services", –ö–∞–∑–∞–Ω—å) [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...d social events. The vacancy is opened in Kazan, remote work is possible...

    We are working with complex solutions for global Retail businesses. Our customers represents brands with global presence, where operational excellence represents high values.
    Our product development unit is responsible for the platform product and associated service deliveries within our Point Of Sales solution.

    Infrastructure, store hardware, software platforms and integrations, in other words the platform on which the Point Of Sales application is running.
    One core part is our own Deployment Engine, proFUSE, which is used to manage large volumes of stores and their tills in operation. Our Deployment Engine is developed on Linux, but we are also using Windows as an Operative System.
    We are now looking for a Senior System Architect for participation in primarily requirement breakdown and High and Low Level Design activities.

    USP:

    • high possibility to bring our POS Solution Platform from the Proof of Concept stage to become a more mature product, with re-useability and effectiveness;
    • technically complex software management solution;
    • global business and development organization.
    • customer interfacing;
    • core Product Management and Development reversed from off-shore to Sweden.

    Work activities:

    • participates in requirement breakdown, understanding the customers' needs, legal requirements and technical limitations;
    • performs High- and Low Level Design;
    • provides relevant system documentation;
    • actively participates in trouble shooting activities with system level knowledge;
    • drives independently technical pre-studies.

    Required competences:

    • minimum 10 years of experience working as a solution- or system level Architect;
    • experience from working in a globally distributed development organization;
    • has experience in Product Development of complex software and hardware products;
    • good knowledge of Product Life Cycle Management;
    • understands the complexity in Product Data Management and version handling;
    • understanding the importance of product documentation as a mean to provide knowledge about a product;
    • fluent in English, written and spoken;
    • moves between different levels of complexity when interacting with others;
    • pedagogical when providing knowledge transfer to others.

    Desirable experience:

    • english, written and spoken;
    • experience from cloud solutions;
    • experience from working with EFT (electronic fund transfer) solutions;
    • experience from working with Fiscal (country specific tax regulation) solutions;
    • experience from Retail;
    • experience from working with POS (point of sales) solutions;
    • experience of PCI DSS/PA-DSS;
    • security awareness;
    • agile system development and Scrum;
    • cloud knowledge (AWS, Azure etc.).

    Tools/Technologies/Software:

    • SUSE Linux / Windows;
    • Documentation solutions (repositories);
    • Ticket Management Systems (Jira/VSTS/Redmine);
    • Python / Bash / Power Shell;
    • Git / GitLab;
    • JavaPOS / UnifiedPOS;
    • Open Build Service (OBS, openSUSE);
    • Automatization, installations, CM (SaltStack, Ansible);
    • Jenkins.

    We offer:

    • employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
    • competitive compensation depending on experience and skills;
    • regular assessments and yearly salary reviews;
    • additional vacation bonus;
    • relocation help;
    • social package - medical care, sports;
    • partial compensation of costs on fitness;
    • free English classes in case of project necessity;
    • training and certifications are organized and paid by the company;
    • opportunities for self-realization;
    • friendly team and enjoyable working environment;
    • experience exchange with global colleagues;
    • corporate and social events.

    The vacancy is opened in Kazan, remote work is possible.


  133. Senior System Architect (Unix/Linux, DevOps, POS, Public Clouds) ("ICL Services", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...d social events. The vacancy is opened in Kazan, remote work is possible...

    We are working with complex solutions for global Retail businesses. Our customers represents brands with global presence, where operational excellence represents high values.
    Our product development unit is responsible for the platform product and associated service deliveries within our Point Of Sales solution.

    Infrastructure, store hardware, software platforms and integrations, in other words the platform on which the Point Of Sales application is running.
    One core part is our own Deployment Engine, proFUSE, which is used to manage large volumes of stores and their tills in operation. Our Deployment Engine is developed on Linux, but we are also using Windows as an Operative System.
    We are now looking for a Senior System Architect for participation in primarily requirement breakdown and High and Low Level Design activities.

    USP:

    • high possibility to bring our POS Solution Platform from the Proof of Concept stage to become a more mature product, with re-useability and effectiveness;
    • technically complex software management solution;
    • global business and development organization.
    • customer interfacing;
    • core Product Management and Development reversed from off-shore to Sweden.

    Work activities:

    • participates in requirement breakdown, understanding the customers' needs, legal requirements and technical limitations;
    • performs High- and Low Level Design;
    • provides relevant system documentation;
    • actively participates in trouble shooting activities with system level knowledge;
    • drives independently technical pre-studies.

    Required competences:

    • minimum 10 years of experience working as a solution- or system level Architect;
    • experience from working in a globally distributed development organization;
    • has experience in Product Development of complex software and hardware products;
    • good knowledge of Product Life Cycle Management;
    • understands the complexity in Product Data Management and version handling;
    • understanding the importance of product documentation as a mean to provide knowledge about a product;
    • fluent in English, written and spoken;
    • moves between different levels of complexity when interacting with others;
    • pedagogical when providing knowledge transfer to others.

    Desirable experience:

    • english, written and spoken;
    • experience from cloud solutions;
    • experience from working with EFT (electronic fund transfer) solutions;
    • experience from working with Fiscal (country specific tax regulation) solutions;
    • experience from Retail;
    • experience from working with POS (point of sales) solutions;
    • experience of PCI DSS/PA-DSS;
    • security awareness;
    • agile system development and Scrum;
    • cloud knowledge (AWS, Azure etc.).

    Tools/Technologies/Software:

    • SUSE Linux / Windows
    • Documentation solutions (repositories)
    • Ticket Management Systems (Jira/VSTS/Redmine)
    • Python / Bash / Power Shell
    • Git / GitLab
    • JavaPOS / UnifiedPOS
    • Open Build Service (OBS, openSUSE)
    • Automatization, installations, CM (SaltStack, Ansible)
    • Jenkins

    We offer:

    • employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
    • competitive compensation depending on experience and skills;
    • regular assessments and yearly salary reviews;
    • additional vacation bonus;
    • relocation help;
    • social package - medical care, sports;
    • partial compensation of costs on fitness;
    • free English classes in case of project necessity;
    • training and certifications are organized and paid by the company;
    • opportunities for self-realization;
    • friendly team and enjoyable working environment;
    • experience exchange with global colleagues;
    • corporate and social events.

    The vacancy is opened in Kazan, remote work is possible.

    • –ó–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ —Å —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ SDN, SD-WAN, Network. Orchestration, NFV.

  135. Lead Fullstack developer (React.js, Node.js) ("USETECH", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from:250000 gross:false to:] [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...—Ç—ã: –æ—Ñ–∏—Å (—Å—Ç.–º. –ü–∞–≤–µ–ª–µ—Ü–∫–∞—è) –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞; –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏ –∞–∫...

    Unique Network ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏ NFT. NFT –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —á—Ç–æ-—Ç–æ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –∏ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏–º–æ–µ, –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ —é–≤–µ–ª–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –∏–∑–¥–µ–ª–∏—è, –∏–≥—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–º–µ—Ç—ã –∏–ª–∏ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∏ –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞. –î–∞–∂–µ —Ç–≤–∏—Ç –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω –∫–∞–∫ NFT.

    –î—Ä—É–≥–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏, —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ—á—Ç–∏ –≤—Å–µ –≤ –º–∏—Ä–µ. –í–æ—Ç –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É –º—ã –¥—É–º–∞–µ–º, —á—Ç–æ —É –Ω–∞—Å –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–µ –±—É–¥—É—â–µ–µ.

    –¶–µ–ª—å –≤–∞—à–µ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã „Ö° –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–º–±–∏–Ω–∞—Ü–∏—é –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è:

    • –Ω–∞–±–æ—Ä –Ω–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–∏—Ö –º–æ–¥—É–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö white label —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è b2b-–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤;
    • –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π —ç–∫–æ—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è b2—Å-–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏.

    –î–ª—è —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ:

    • –≤–æ–∑–≥–ª–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π web-–∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
      (2 frontend-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞, 2 backend-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞, 2 DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞, 2 QA-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞, –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä);
    • –ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–¥ —Å–∞–º–æ–º—É –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —Å—É–ø–µ—Ä-–ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ Code Review –Ω–∞ React.JS + Node.JS backend;
    • –≤–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ç—å –≤ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-—Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–∏ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è;
    • –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å–æ—á–∞–π—à–µ–µ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∫–æ–Ω–µ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞;
    • —É–º–µ—Ç—å –∏ –ª—é–±–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —É—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–º—É.

    –ü—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –≤—ã —Å–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ:

    • —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π;
    • —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–µ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–π;
    • –±—ã—Ç—å –≤ —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥—Ü–µ–≤ Blockchain –∏ NFT.

    –ù–∞—à –∏–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç:

    • 5+ –ª–µ—Ç –æ–ø—ã—Ç–∞ –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –ü–û –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞/–∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞;
    • –æ—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ–µ –≤–ª–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ JavaScript/TypeScript;
    • —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è React, HTML, CSS –∏ Node.JS backend;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω–æ–π, –Ω–æ –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º–æ–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã (–∫–∞–∫ —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—ã backend, —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—ã frontend);
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ REST —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –º–∏–∫—Ä–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞–º–∏;
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–∞–º SOLID –∏ OOD;
    • –ø–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∏–∑–º –≤ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞ –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞;
    • –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, GitFlow, CI/–°D;
    • –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ, —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å –∏ —Ä–µ—à–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤;
    • —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ, –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ—á–Ω—ã–π –¥–ª—è —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∏ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ „Ö° –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–Ω, —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π „Ö° –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º;
    • –æ–ø—ã—Ç –≤ Open Source b2b –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º;
    • –∂–∏–≤–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å –∫ Blockchain –∏ NFT —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º;

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ì–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: –æ—Ñ–∏—Å (—Å—Ç.–º. –ü–∞–≤–µ–ª–µ—Ü–∫–∞—è) –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞;
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞—é—â–µ–π—Å—è IT-–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –≥–¥–µ –Ω–µ—Ç –±—é—Ä–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–∏, –∏ –≤—Å–µ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∑–Ω–∞—é—Ç –¥—Ä—É–≥ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∞ –≤ –ª–∏—Ü–æ;
    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ —Å–ª–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç–µ–∫–∞ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π;
    • –î–ú–°;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è;
    • –°–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ –æ—Ç –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –†–µ–≥—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ–º–∏–Ω–∞—Ä—ã, –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º –∏ —Å–∞–º—ã–º –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º —Ç–µ–º–∞–º –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è;
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–æ–µ —É—Ç—Ä–æ (—Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å 08.00 ‚Äì 12.00).


  136. –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫ (—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤) ("–î–û–ú.–†–§", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã - –≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—...

    –î–û–ú.–†–§ ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—É—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—è –≤ –∂–∏–ª–∏—â–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ. –ù–∞—à–∞ –º–∏—Å—Å–∏—è ‚Äî –≤—ã—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥ –∫ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—é —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä—ã –∂–∏–ª–∏—â–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏ –∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–≤ –µ–≥–æ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã–º –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω—ã–º –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–∞–Ω.

    –ù–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç —É –Ω–∞—Å –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 5 500 —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤, –∏–∑ –Ω–∏—Ö ~10% - —ç—Ç–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç—ã –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π. –ò —ç—Ç–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ!

    –°–∞–º–∞—è –æ–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω–∞—è –¥–≤–∏–∂—É—Ö–∞ –ø–æ —Ü–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–æ–π —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å –ø—Ä–æ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏, –≥–¥–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Å –Ω—É–ª—è –∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∞–±—Å–æ–ª—é—Ç–Ω–æ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã. Agile, DevOps, —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ñ–∏—Å, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã - –≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è :)

    –ú–´ –ú–û–ñ–ï–ú –ë–´–¢–¨ –¢–ï–ë–ï –ò–ù–¢–ï–†–ï–°–ù–´, –ü–û–¢–û–ú–£ –ß–¢–û –ú–´ –ì–ê–†–ê–ù–¢–ò–†–£–ï–ú:

    • –ö–æ–Ω–∫—É—Ä–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω—ã–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –∑–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –∏ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–µ –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏
    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã
    • –ö–æ–º—Ñ–æ—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–π agile-–æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–µ –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç. –º. –î–∏–Ω–∞–º–æ (–¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö, –∫—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –ª—é–±–∏—Ç —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–∫—É)
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è
    • –†–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—É –î–ú–°, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—é
    • –ö–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏—é –∞–±–æ–Ω–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –≤ —Ñ–∏—Ç–Ω–µ—Å-–∫–ª—É–± –∏ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º—É —è–∑—ã–∫—É
    • –°–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è –ø–æ –∫—Ä–µ–¥–∏—Ç–∞–º –∏ –∏–ø–æ—Ç–µ–∫–µ –æ—Ç –ë–∞–Ω–∫–∞ –î–û–ú.–†–§ –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤
    • –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∫–∏–¥–∫–∏ —É –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–æ–≤ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã –î–û–ú.–†–§
    • –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å (—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏—è, –±–ª–∞–≥–æ—Ç–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å)

    –ß–ï–ú –ü–†–ï–î–°–¢–û–ò–¢ –ó–ê–ù–ò–ú–ê–¢–¨–°–Ø:

    • –§–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –§–¢/–ë–¢ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤
    • –§–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–æ–π –¢–ó –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ BA/SA –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç—è–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ —Ü–∏–∫–ª–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏

    –ß–¢–û –î–õ–Ø –ù–ê–° –í–ê–ñ–ù–û:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–æ–º –≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ç 2—Ö –ª–µ—Ç
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π –∫ –∏–º–µ—é—â–∏–º—Å—è, –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã—Ö –∫ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—é, –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑–ª–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å –º—ã—Å–ª–∏ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ –∏ —á–µ—Ç–∫–æ
    • –£–º–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–µ–∫–æ–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏
    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã UML, BPMN, SOA, Jira, Confluence, Enterprise Architect
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —è–∑—ã–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏

    –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ç–µ–±–µ –æ—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞—à–∞ –∏–¥–µ–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è, —Ç—ã –ª—é–±–∏—à—å —Ä–µ—à–∞—Ç—å –Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏ –∏ —Ö–æ—á–µ—à—å –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–∞—Å—à—Ç–∞–±–∞, —Å–º–µ–ª–µ–µ –æ—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–∞–π—Å—è!


  137. –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç 1–° ("–ü–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª-–Æ–≥", –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä) map[currency:RUR from:55000 gross:true to:130000] [ 2021-08-27 ]
    ...–æ—Ç 130 —Ç.—Ä. (–≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç) –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–∑ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞ ? –î–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –Ω–µ—Ç...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è ¬´–ü–æ—Ä—Ç–∞–ª-–Æ–≥¬ª –≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Å–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–º –∏ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏—Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∫ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ 1–°!

    –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –†–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç:
      • –í–≥–ª—É–±—å ‚Äì –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞—Ç—å –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ –Ω—ë–º:
        • –û—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –º—ã –ª—é–±–∏–º –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤: 1–°: ERP, 1–°: –£–•, –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–æ–±–æ—Ä–æ—Ç, –ó–£–ü –ö–û–†–ü, –ë–ü –ö–û–†–ü (–∏ –≤–æ–æ–±—â–µ –≤—Å—ë –ö–û–†–ü)
        • –í—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ —Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–º –±–µ—Ä–µ–º—Å—è –∑–∞ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, —á–∞—Ç-–±–æ—Ç—ã, –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –≤–æ—Ç —ç—Ç–æ –≤—Å—ë
        • –û—á–µ–Ω—å —Å—Ç–∞—Ä–∞–µ–º—Å—è –ø—Ä–∏–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ 1–° –∏ –¥–∞–∂–µ –ø—Ä–µ–≤–æ—Å—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –∏—Ö (–ø–æ—á—Ç–∏ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è!)
        • –¢—Ä–µ–ø–µ—Ç–Ω–æ –ª—é–±–∏–º 1–°: –°–ü–ü–† –∏ –≤–æ–æ–±—â–µ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
        • –ù—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è, —á—Ç–æ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã –Ω–µ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ, –Ω–æ –∏ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ
      • –í—à–∏—Ä—å ‚Äì –æ—Å–≤–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è 1–°, –∏–ª–∏ –≤–æ–æ–±—â–µ –Ω–µ 1–°, –∞ devops –∏–ª–∏ –ë–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–∫—Å:
        • –í–ø–ª–æ—Ç—å –¥–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ç—á—É–∂–¥–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏/–∏–ª–∏ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è –º–∞–≥–∞–∑–∏–Ω–æ–≤ (—Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ —Å–∞–º–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç —Å –ø—Ä–∏–±—ã–ª–∏)
        • –û—Å–≤–∞–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–∏: CRM, –£–ê–¢, WMS, –¢–û–ò–† ‚Äì —Ç—ã—Å—è—á–∏ –∏—Ö! –ò –≤—Å–µ –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã
    • –†–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–∞–∫ —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å:
      • –ü—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –±—ã—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–∞–≤–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º –∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ—é –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É
      • –ü—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∫–∞–∫ teamlead, —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä, —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞. –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏ –æ–Ω–∏ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ ‚Äì –æ—Ç –≥–æ—Å—É–¥–∞—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π (–†–æ—Å–≤–æ–¥–æ–∫–∞–Ω–∞–ª, –ú–∞–≥–Ω–∏—Ç, –§–ì–£–ü –ö–æ—Å–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è —Å–≤—è–∑—å –∏ —Ç.–¥.) –¥–æ —É—é—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ–±–æ–ª—å—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Ä—É–∫–∞ –æ–± —Ä—É–∫—É —Å —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Ç–æ–ø –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏
      • –°–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ ‚Äì –Ω–µ–±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ, –∑–∞—Ç–æ –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–æ —Å –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –∏ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞
      • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤ pre-sale –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≥—Ä–∞–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∑–∞–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–æ–≤

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º:

    • –ü–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç—Ä—É–¥–æ—É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∏ –±–µ–ª–∞—è –∑–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞. –ú—ã –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—Ü–∏–ø–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Ç–∞–∫ –∏ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Ç–∞–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º —Å —Å–∞–º–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è ‚Äì —É–∂–µ 19 –ª–µ—Ç
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–∏: –æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–¥–µ–ª–∫–∞ ‚Äì –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—à—å —Ç—ã —Å–∞–º.
    • –û—Ç 55 —Ç.—Ä. (–°–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç), –æ—Ç 90 —Ç.—Ä (–í–µ–¥—É—â–∏–π —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç), –æ—Ç 130 —Ç.—Ä. (–≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç)
    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–∑ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞ ? –î–ª—è –Ω–∞—Å –Ω–µ—Ç —ç—Ç–æ–π –¥–∏–ª–µ–º–º—ã ‚Äì –≤—ã–±–æ—Ä –∑–∞ –≤–∞–º–∏: –ª–∏–±–æ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞, –ª–∏–±–æ‚Ä¶–≤–µ—Å—å –º–∏—Ä —É –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö –Ω–æ–≥
    • –õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: –≥. –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä + –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –∏–∑ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤ + –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏
    • –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –î–ú–° –∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–µ–Ω—Å–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç–∏–π —Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–æ–º ‚Äì –≤—Å—ë –¥–ª—è –∑–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å—è
    • –¢–≤–æ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –∏ –¥—Ä—É–∂–µ–ª—é–±–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤. –ü—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º 12 —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ —Ç–µ—Ö–≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º ‚Äì –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –µ—Å—Ç—å –æ —á–µ–º –ø–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å –∏ –Ω–∞–¥ —á–µ–º –ø–æ—Å–º–µ—è—Ç—å—Å—è. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ –µ–¥–∏–Ω–æ–º—ã—à–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ ‚Äì —ç—Ç–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω–æ
    • –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤—ã –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å —Å —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π. –ù–∞ —é–≥–µ —Ç–µ–ø–ª–æ –∏ —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–æ –∂–∏–≤—ë—Ç—Å—è. –ù–∞—à–∏ —Ñ–∏–ª–∏–∞–ª—ã –≤ –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ä—Å–∫–æ–º –∫—Ä–∞–µ, –°—Ç–∞–≤—Ä–æ–ø–æ–ª—å–µ –∏–ª–∏ –ö—Ä—ã–º—É ‚Äì –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–π—Ç–µ.
    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã:
      • –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ–∫ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏
      • –ú–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∏–∫–∞: –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-–ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–º–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏
      • –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞–º–∏
      • –ö—Ä—É–≥–ª—ã–µ —Å—Ç–æ–ª—ã –ø–æ –∞–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞–º –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏
      • –û–≥—Ä–æ–º–Ω–∞—è –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—è—è –±–∏–±–ª–∏–æ—Ç–µ–∫–∞ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ 1–°: –ö–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç
    • –í–Ω–µ—à–Ω–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –æ—Ç 1–°, –ì–∏–ª–µ–≤–∞, –ù–∞—Å–∏–ø–æ–≤–∞, –ª—é–±—ã–µ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–µ ‚Äì –∑–∞ —Å—á—ë—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏


  138. DevSecOps Engineer (AWS, Remote) ("ClearScale", –ö–∏–µ–≤) map[currency:USD from:4500 gross:true to:] [ 2021-08-26 ]
    ... the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a...

    About us

    ClearScale LLC (headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA) - AWS Premier Consulting Partner has been offering a full range of professional cloud computing services for over 10 years, including architecture design, DevOps automation, refactoring and cloud-native applications development, integration, migration, solving all sorts of security issues (from just a security check to preventing cyber-attacks) and 24/7 technical support using the best advanced technologies.

    The list of our customers is diverse: from government companies (ClearScale is an official cloud partner of the state of California) and educational institutions (University of California, San Francisco) to well-known global brands (IBM, Samsung, GoPro, HP, Conde Nast, Carl Zeiss, etc.) The number of satisfied customers has been well over 850, some of which can be found on the company's website in the Case Studies section.

    - We were the third company to gain a new AWS competence - Applied AI and Machine Learning Operations (MLOps). BTW less than 15 partners have this competence!

    - We have confirmed status in the Database Freedom program (total less than 20 companies in)

    - Proven expertise as a Managed Services Provider (total less than 16 companies in). This means that ClearScale can perform a full cycle of work - from audits, system or software development to round-the-clock support (24/7). You can read more about this on the company's page - Managed Services.

    Since the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a high trust basis within the company, therefore we do not monitor work being done via taking screen captures, webcams or log keyboard typing, as many other companies do. The professional reputation of our employees is of the highest value.


    About the role

    ClearScale's security team is growing rapidly and looking for an experienced DevSecOps Engineer to assist with DevOps efforts and join our team of passionate professionals. Identify and implement security improvements, implement secure practices, defense in-depth and monitoring and event response tool sets to handle growing threats in the cloud. Work closely with DevOps, DBAs, Systems, SA and Network teams to refine and enforce security practices.

    Basic qualification:

    • Bachelors in Computer Science or related field
    • Engineering cloud security guard rails in AWS.
    • Strong understanding of technologies and security implications deployed in AWS
    • Experience deploying automated security tooling in CI/CD pipelines.
    • Experience deploying AWS WAF
    • Experience performing AWS security audit and compliance assessments.
    • Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) tools ‚Äì AWS GuardDuty, AWS Config, AWS Firewall Manager, AWS Detective, etc.
    • Infrastructure as Code (IaC) ‚Äì Ansible, Terraform, AWS Cloudformation.
    • Scripting languages such as Bash, Python, etc.

    Who you are:

    • Love CLI
    • Proficiency in a Strongly Typed language
    • Interest and experience in AWS
    • Should have experience in building CI/CD
    • Should have experience in deploying AWS WAF
    • Don't mind learning new technologies to implement user-facing features
    • Prior experience building security solutions in AWS
    • Have experience providing security services to public-facing tools/applications/sites
    • Comfortable communicating your technical thought process to non-technical team members
    • Can work independently given a user story and a definition of done
    • Love to demo your work to the team and customers
    • Prefer being user-focused as opposed to being technology-focused

    Job responsibilities:

    • Work as a DevSecOps Engineer focusing on security problems
    • Develop Infrastructure as Code and Configuration as Code
    • Use security best practices in creating secure AWS infrastructures
    • Develop bash/python scripts
    • Eagerly look for opportunities to automate
    • Creating and deploying security solutions based on AWS services
    • Help in DevSecOps tasks such as container security, hardening, baselining, and CI/CD security
    • Performing AWS security audits and compliance assessments
    • Deploying and configuring AWS WAF
    • Incident management
    • Automation of security controls
    • Control and management of security operations
    • Project Documentation (Diagrams, Architecture Design, Instructions, Handover documents)
    • Communications with the customer in English (emails, slack chat, work sessions)

    Required skills and experience

    • Experience with all aspects of DevOps (source control, continuous integration, deployments, etc.)
    • AWS Ops experience is a must. We are looking for a minimum of 2 years
    • Excellent troubleshooting skills
    • Linux Server support (3-5 years)
    • Production infrastructure support (3-5 years)
    • Experience with AWS Security tools
    • Experience with aws security audit and compliance assessments
    • Experience with AWS WAF
    • High level of expertise with key and security AWS services

    Desired Certifications (not a must)

    • Certified Solutions Architect ‚Äì (Associate / Professional)
    • Certified DevOps Engineer ‚Äì (Associate / Professional)
    • Certified SysOps Administrator ‚Äì (Associate / Professional)
    • Certified Developer ‚Äì (Associate)

    What we offer

    # 1 Fair wage

    - Fixed hourly rate in US dollars (fluctuate ruble exchange rate is actually being a plus during the last few years)

    - Full-time load, 40 hours per week. It‚Äôs your main place of work not a side job.

    - Payments on a clear schedule every 2 weeks.

    - Annual Hourly Rate Review - received appreciation from a client, passed a kewl AWS certificate, saved the world? We reward on the basis of facts, not a personal relation.

    - Reference program - many engineers came to the team on the recommendation of their friends and former colleagues and we have a reward for this.

    # 2 Independence

    - From the location or office conditions because it is only your choice where exactly you want to work - from home, office, coworking space or outdoors in the forest with only one requirement - fast and stable internet. At the same time, our engineers do not work evenings or weekends because our focus is on the employee's local time.

    - From annoying co-workers with their small talks - we are a community of professional engineers, no BS.

    - From corruption and bureaucracy - we operate in an honest and competitive environment and are one of AWS's top 10 key partners.

    # 3 Professional Development

    - Work with innovative Silicon Valley companies and traditional American companies at the cutting edge of digital transformation.

    - We work with the newest technologies in the AWS cloud and open-source tools, Jira, Confluence, Lucidchart, Slack.

    - Constant practice in writing and speaking English.

    - A Russian-speaking technical team sharing their expertise.

    - Paid AWS certification - provide training material, set of paid time and pay for examinations.

    - Horizontal and vertical career growth - are you ready to be greater, faster, stronger? We keep growing and people keep growing with us.


  139. Cloud Data Scientist (AWS, remote) ("ClearScale", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) map[currency:RUR from:300000 gross:true to:] [ 2021-08-26 ]
    ... the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a...

    ABOUT CLEARSCALE

    ClearScale LLC (headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA) - AWS Premier Consulting Partner has been offering a full range of professional cloud computing services for over 10 years, including architecture design, DevOps automation, refactoring and cloud-native applications development, integration, migration, solving all sorts of security issues (from just a security check to preventing cyber-attacks) and 24/7 technical support using the best advanced technologies.

    The list of our customers is diverse: from government companies (ClearScale is an official cloud partner of the state of California) and educational institutions (University of California, San Francisco) to well-known global brands (IBM, Samsung, GoPro, HP, Conde Nast, Carl Zeiss, etc.) The number of satisfied customers has been well over 850, some of which can be found on the company's website in the Case Studies section.

    Since the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a high trust basis within the company, therefore we do not monitor work being done via taking screen captures, webcams or log keyboard typing, as many other companies do. The professional standing of the engineers in our community is invaluable.

    About the role

    ClearScale is looking for an individual who performs a Machine Learning Developer or Data Scientist role. The successful candidate should demonstrate the ability to build, train, tune, and deploy machine learning (ML) models.

    About the project

    ClearScale is running various projects closely related to Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Internet Of Things.
    One of the projects is aiming at creation of valuable insights and forecasts for stock market investors and traders based on companies fundamentals, contracts data, news feed sentiment. It requires strong expertize in neural networks, NLP and various ML algorithms.
    Others include recommendation engines for e-commerce companies as well as for public/private educational organizations.
    These projects either startups started from the scratch either bring completely new techniques to the mature businesses.

    Responsibilities

    • Select and justify the appropriate ML approach for a given business problem
    • Design and implement scalable, cost-optimized, reliable, and secure ML solutions
    • The ability to express the intuition behind basic ML algorithms
    • Create data repositories for machine learning
    • Identify and implement a data-ingestion solution
    • Identify and implement a data-transformation solution
    • Sanitize and prepare data for modeling
    • Perform feature engineering (missing and unbalanced data, outliers)
    • Analyze and visualize data for machine learning
    • Train machine learning models
    • Perform model tuning (learning rate, regularization techniques), hyperparameter optimization
    • Evaluate machine learning models
    • Deploy and operationalize machine learning solutions

    Requirements

    • Bachelor or Specialist/Masters in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field

    • 2+ years of experience in Machine Learning/Data Science applications (classical and deep learning models, ensemble learning)
    • 2+ years of experience in Python ML frameworks (NumPy, SciPy, scikit_learn, Pandas, Jupyter, Matplotlib)

    Would be a plus

    • Knowledge of ANSI SQL (ability to write advanced analytical queries)

    • In-depth knowledge in one or more Machine Learning areas: Deep Learning, NLP, Recommender Systems, Reinforcement Learning
    • In-depth knowledge of Tensorflow/Keras
    • In-depth knowledge of AWS SageMaker and one or more of the following related algorithms: Linear Learner, XGBoost, Seq2Seq, DeepAR, BlazingText, Object2Vec, Object Detection, Image Classification, Semantic Segmentation, Random Cut Forest, Neural Topic Model, Latent Dirichlet Allocation, K-Nearest-Neighbors, K-Means, Principal Component Analysis, Factorization Machines, IP Insights, Reinforcement Learning, Automated Model Tuning
    • In-depth knowledge of one or more of the following AWS technologies: S3, Kinesis, Glue, Redshift, RDS, Aurora, DynamoDB, ElastiCache, Data Pipeline, Batch, DMS, Step Functions, Athena, QuickSight, EMR, SageMaker, Ground Truth, Comprehend, Translate, Transcribe, Polly, Rekognition, Forecast, Lex, Personalize, Textract, DeepRacer, DeepLens, IoT
    • Hands-on experience with Apache Spark MLLib (Zeppelin)
    • Hands-on experience with OpenCV
    • Hands-on experience with advanced Python data frameworks (Seaborn, PyTorch, Dask)

    Valid AWS certificates would be a great plus (not a must):

    • AWS Certified Solutions Architect ‚Äì (Associate / Professional)
    • AWS Certified DevOps Engineer ‚Äì (Professional)
    • AWS Certified SysOps Administrator ‚Äì (Associate)
    • AWS Certified Developer ‚Äì (Associate)

    We offer

    # 1 Fair wage

    - Fixed hourly rate in US dollars for the time worked on projects (fluctuate ruble exchange rate is actually being a plus during the last few years)

    - Full-time load, 40 hours per week. It‚Äôs your main place of work not a side job.

    - Payments on a clear schedule every 2 weeks.

    - Annual Hourly Rate Review - received appreciation from a client, passed a kewl AWS certificate, saved the world? We reward on the basis of facts, not a personal relation.

    - Reference program - many engineers came to the team on the recommendation of their friends and former colleagues and we have a reward for this.

    # 2 Independence

    - From the location or office conditions because it is only your choice where exactly you want to work - from home, office, co-working space or outdoors in the forest with only one requirement - fast and stable internet. At the same time, our engineers do not work evenings or weekends because our focus is on the employee's local time.

    - From annoying co-workers with their small talks - we are a community of professional engineers, no BS.

    - From corruption and bureaucracy - we operate in an honest and competitive environment and are one of AWS's top 10 key partners.

    # 3 Professional Development

    - Work with innovative Silicon Valley companies and traditional American companies at the cutting edge of digital transformation.

    - We work with the newest technologies in the AWS cloud and open-source tools, Jira, Confluence, Lucidchart, Slack.

    - Constant practice in writing and speaking English.

    - A Russian-speaking technical team sharing their expertise.

    - Paid AWS certification - we provide training material, set of paid time and pay for examinations.

    - Horizontal and vertical career growth - are you ready to be greater, faster, stronger? We keep growing and people keep growing with us.


  140. Azure Solutions Architect ("ICL Services", –°–∞–Ω–∫—Ç-–ü–µ—Ç–µ—Ä–±—É—Ä–≥) [ 2021-08-26 ]
    ...lasses in case of project necessity; an option of remote work; friendly team and enjoyable working environ...

    Caused by growing expansion to the fast-moving public clouds market we are looking for the experienced Azure Customer Solutions Architects (CSAs) focused on developing and implementing Azure-based technical solutions, capable to act and interact directly with EU customers.

    Accountability

    Being a part of big architecture team, your responsibility should be:

    • comprehensive design and overseeing of technical solutions based on Azure and other MS technologies. Build and implement activities support;
    • provide guidance and recommendations for cloud infrastructure improvements to make customer‚Äôs business more profitable;
    • monitor cloud technology trends, participate in continuous service improvement activities;
    • interaction with customers, pre-sales/up sales activities.

    Skills Required

    We expect that successful candidate has:

    • degree in a computer science or information systems related discipline, or equivalent relevant experience;
    • natural-born leader talent with excellent analytical and communication skills;
    • strong presentation and facilitation skills;
    • expertise in technical documentation development in English;
    • practical experience of Azure infrastructure design and customer workloads migration;
    • good knowledge of English.

    We also expect that candidate has hands on experience and strong knowledge in the following areas:

    • Azure components and their cross-connection among each other and with on-premises systems;
    • Windows operating systems roles (AD, DNS, DHCP) and relying infrastructure components support experience (Network, Storage, Virtualization);
    • ITIL methodology and operational processes (incident, change and problem management)-proofed certification is an advantage;
    • Azure automation technologies (Azure Logic Apps, Azure Automation, Functions) awareness;
    • IaaC/DSC, Azure DevOps and CI/CD methodology awareness;
    • MS Azure certification (AZ-30x, AZ-40x); other public clouds certification is an advantage;
    • ITIL methodology awareness.

    We offer:

    • a job in a stable company with good reputation;
    • daily communication with foreign teammates;
    • free English classes in case of project necessity;
    • an option of remote work;
    • friendly team and enjoyable working environment;
    • employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
    • competitive compensation depending on experience and skills;
    • regular assessments and yearly salary reviews;
    • additional bonuses based on your skills, experience and work performance;
    • newcomers from other towns are assisted with relocation;
    • social package - medical care, sports;
    • training and certifications are organized and paid by the company.

    The vacancy is opened in Kazan, remote work is possible.

    ...ions and support from colleagues. We are offering remote work. Technology DevOps stack: IaC: Azure Reso...

    *instinctools is looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer who is eager to undertake various solid tasks and see problems before they happen.We provide smooth projects onboarding: knowledge transfer sessions and support from colleagues.

    We are offering remote work.

    Technology DevOps stack:

    • IaC: Azure Resource Manager;

    • Cloud: Azure;

    • Containerizations: Docker, k8s;

    • Monitoring/logging: ELK, Splunk, Zabbix;

    • OS: Windows, Linux;

    • CI/CD: Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub Actions.

    • Hands-on scripting experience at Powershell (e.g. Python, Bash, Perl, JavaScript, etc.)

    • You don‚Äôt have to be an expert in all of these technologies.

    Our expectations of the candidate:

    You are a highly driven, solutions-oriented technical professional, who wants to be able to:

    • Experience architecting/operating solutions built on Azure;

    • deal with the current Terraform code and add new logic to automation;

    • deal with the existing ansible code and add new logic;

    • maintain and troubleshoot the K8s infrastructure;

    • work with CI/CD tools (Gitlab, Jenkins, CircleCI, GitHub depending on the project);

    • problem-solving of Azure infrastructure;

    • monitoring and logging (ELK Stack, Zabbix, Splunk depending on the project);

    • has basic experience in database administration;

    • communicate with customers on daily basis

    • has outstanding communication skills in English (upper-intermediate or higher);

    • promote the development and growth of the DevOps team.

    We offer:

    • A relaxed atmosphere without formalism and bureaucracy;
    • Flexible working time;
    • Diverse benefits package and soulful office parties;
    • Stability. We have been on the market for 21 years and we are HTP Belarus resident;

    About our company:

    Currently our company is going through the stage of active growth and changes which means we are building a brand new corporate culture - the culture of growth and self-development.

    Our main focus now is on personal and working environment upgrading. We strongly believe that professionalism of employees is one of the company‚Äôs main assets so we arrange internal training and coaching sessions as well as knowledge sharing meetups on a regular basis.

    You have an amazing opportunity to join our team and take part in realization of inspiring company‚Äôs goals.


  144. Data/BI engineer (Java/Scala, RedShift, QS, Spotfire) ("ClearScale", –°–∞—Ä–∞—Ç–æ–≤) map[currency:USD from:5000 gross:true to:7200] [ 2021-08-25 ]
    ... the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a...

    ClearScale (headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA) - AWS Premier Consulting Partner has been offering a full range of professional cloud computing services for over 10 years, including architecture design, DevOps automation, refactoring and cloud-native applications development, integration, migration, solving all sorts of security issues (from just a security check to preventing cyber-attacks) and 24/7 technical support using the best advanced technologies.

    The list of our customers is diverse: from government companies (ClearScale is an official cloud partner of the State of California) and educational institutions (University of California, San Francisco) to well-known global brands (IBM, Samsung, GoPro, HP, Conde Nast, Carl Zeiss, etc.) The number of satisfied customers has been well over 850, some of which can be found on the company's website in the Case Studies section.

    • We were the third company to gain a new AWS competence: Applied AI and Machine Learning Operations (MLOps). Less than 15 partners have this competency!
    • We have confirmed status in the Database Freedom program (total less than 20 companies in)
    • Proven expertise as a Managed Services Provider (total less than 16 companies in). This means that ClearScale can perform a full cycle consultancy and service: from audits, system or software development to the 24/7. You can read more about us on the company page - Managed Services.

    Since the very foundation of the company, we work 100% remotely from various cities and countries. We work on a high trust basis within the company, therefore we do not monitor work being done via taking screen captures, webcams or log keyboard typing, as many other companies do. The professional reputation of our employees is of the highest value.

    About the role

    ClearScale is looking for AWS Data Engineer to participate in building cost-efficient scalable data lakes for the wide variety of customers, from the small startups to the large enterprises. Usually, our projects fit into one of the categories (but not limited to them):

    • Architect, develop and maintain AWS Glue data pipelines for Analytics SaaS solution
    • Work with BI tools for visual data representation
    • Evolve DataLake solution for multi-tenant fintech AWS SaaS platform

    You will become part of a mid-sized distributed engineering team that is responsible for preparing infrastructure, designing application architecture, implementing and stabilizing program code, running load tests, optimizing performance, and providing operational support.

    About the project

    The Client is a venture-funded, fintech company that provides integrated credit score and personal finance solutions to over 125 Credit Unions and Banks. The Client's solution provides a free credit score, report, and daily monitoring. Its pre-qualification offer engine displays targeted financial offers from the financial service partner based on the user‚Äôs credit score. The number of customers has significantly grown since 2018.

    ClearScale has previously developed a multi-tenant AWS cloud-native SaaS platform for The Client to power credit score and personal finance solutions. ClearScale has also implemented an event-based data architecture to support several most important data-driven analytical reports. Now ClearScale has been asked to deliver the following:

    + DWH/BI audit and modernization plan: analyze the existing Microsoft SQL Server-based DWH, identify data consolidation flows, analytical queries, and aggregation tables/views, inspect existing integration with Spotfire BI tool, and develop a modernization plan to implement Amazon Redshift-based DWH

    + Data platform MVP: evolve existing event-based data architecture with new events and aggregate batch processing

    + BI integration MVP: integrate Redshift with Spotfire and QuickSight BI tools

    + Data export layer design and functional POC: describe and prototype architecture to enable 3rd party consumers API integration

    Responsibilities

    • Develop and improve data pipelines and Data Lake env based on AWS Serverless Glue Analytics + Redshift DWH
    • Examine performance and advise necessary infrastructure changes
    • Implement integration to Spotfire and QuickSight
    • Performing code reviews
    • Documentation of new functionality
    • Analyze, scope and estimate tasks, identify technology stack and tools
    • Communicate with client on project-related issues

    Required skills and experience

    ClearScale expects a successful candidate to have most of the following qualifications and skills (not necessary all have to be presented):

    We are looking for a candidate with 7+ years of experience in Data, Cloud or Software Engineer role, who has attained a degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field

    • Hands-on experience designing efficient architectures for high-load enterprise-scale applications or ‚Äòbig data‚Äô pipelines
    • Practical experience in implementing of micro-services architectures (using Java or Scala stack)
    • Hands-on experience with message queuing, stream processing and highly scalable ‚Äòbig data‚Äô stores
    • Advanced knowledge and experience working with SQL and noSQL databases
    • Proven experience in re-design and re-architecting of the large complex business applications
    • Strong self-management and self-organizational skills

    Successful candidates should have experience with any of the following software/tools (not all required at the same time):

    • Java/Scala - strong knowledge
    • Strong knowledge of AWS cloud services: AWS Redshift, AWS Glue, AWS Lamda
    • Big data tools: Kafka, Spark, Hadoop (HDFS3, YARN2,Tez, Hive, HBase)
    • Stream-processing systems: Kinesis Streaming, Spark-Streaming, Kafka Streams, Kinesis Analytics
    • Message queue systems: ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, AWS SQS
    • Federated identity services (SSO): Okta, AWS Cognito
    • Valid AWS certificates would be a great plus
    • Ability to carry on communication in English in emails and chats with customers. Ideal candidate has fluent English to maintain technical calls with the US teammates

    What we offer

    # 1 Fair wage

    • Fixed hourly rate in USD
    • Full-time, 40 hours per week contract. It‚Äôs your main and permanent place of work, not a freelance job
    • Payments every 2 weeks
    • Annual Hourly Rate Review: received client's appreciation, obtained an AWS certificate, saved the world?The reward is based on facts, not on a personal attitude
    • Reference program: many engineers joined the team by the recommendation from their friends and former colleagues and we have a reward for this.

    # 2 Independence

    • from the office location or office conditions because it's only up to you where you want to work from - home, office, co-working or outdoors in the woods. The only requirement - fast and reliable internet. At the same time, our engineers do not work evenings or weekends: we focus on your local timezone
    • from any annoyance or big team buzz - we are the community of professional engineers, valuing each others' time and effort
    • from corruption and bureaucracy - we operate in an honest and competitive environment and we are one of the AWS's top 10 key partners.

    # 3 Professional Development

    • Work with innovative Silicon Valley companies and traditional American companies at the cutting edge of digital transformation
    • We work with the newest technologies in AWS cloud and open-source tools, Jira, Confluence, Lucidchart, Slack
    • Constant practice at writing and speaking in English
    • The team which is willing to share its experience
    • Paid AWS certification: we provide training material, paid time off and examination itself
    • Horizontal and vertical career growth - are you ready to be greater, faster, stronger? We keep growing and people keep growing with us
    • A nice bonus if you accept our offer quickly

    ClearScale (headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA) - AWS Premier Consulting Partner has been offering a full range of professional cloud computing services for over 10 years, including architecture design, DevOps automation, refactoring and cloud-native applications development, integration, migration, solving all sorts of security issues (from just a security check to preventing cyber-attacks) and 24/7 technical support using the best advanced technologies.

    The list of our customers is diverse: from government companies (ClearScale is an official cloud partner of the State of California) and educational institutions (University of California, San Francisco) to well-known global brands (IBM, Samsung, GoPro, HP, Conde Nast, Carl Zeiss, etc.) The number of satisfied customers has been well over 850, some of which can be found on the company's website in the Case Studies section.

    • We were the third company to gain a new AWS competence: Applied AI and Machine Learning Operations (MLOps). Less than 15 partners have this competency!
    • We have confirmed status in the Database Freedom program (total less than 20 companies in)
    • Proven expertise as a Managed Services Provider (total less than 16 companies in). This means that ClearScale can perform a full cycle consultancy and service: from audits, system or software development to the 24/7. You can read more about us on the company page - Managed Services.

The professional reputation of our employees is of the highest value.

    About the role

    ClearScale is looking for a Data Analyst to participate in building and maintaining analytical solutions based on scalable data lakes (AWS) for the multi-tenant SaaS FinTech platform.

    Responsibilities

    • Collect, interpret and analyze the data from multiple heterogeneous data sources (AWS Lake Formation, SQL OLTP Databases)
    • Perform data mining using different querying techniques of SQL
    • Work with BI tools for visual data representation/reporting
    • Perform Data Quality Assurance of the dashboards/reports present in Analytics platforms (internal and client's analytics)
    • Communicate with client on data mining requirements/ reporting
    • Closely working with Data Engineers/Architects
    • Document results of data analysis

    Description of candidate requirements

    ClearScale expects successful candidate to have most of the following qualifications and skills (not necessary all have to be presented):

    We are looking for a candidate with 4+ years of experience in Data Analyst role, who has attained a degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field with

    • Strong experience in data extraction/writing data quires for analysis across SQL (as a plus NoSQL) databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MS SQL Server, AWS Redshift, AWS Athena)
    • Experience in BI Tools (Tableau, Spotfire, AWS QuickSight, Cognos), reports visualization
    • Solid knowledge of data interpretation and analysis using MS Excel
    • Experience in Data Quality Assurance approaches

    • Must have good attitude and excellent communication skills (english)

    • Experience in validation, cleanup, and formatting of data

    • Ability to overlap with US PT time zone (2-3 hours)

    What we offer

    # 1 Fair wage

    • Fixed hourly rate in USD
    • Full-time, 40 hours per week contract. It‚Äôs your main and permanent place of work, not a freelance job
    • Payments every 2 weeks
    • Annual Hourly Rate Review: received client's appreciation, obtained an AWS certificate, saved the world?The reward is based on facts, not on a personal attitude
    • Reference program: many engineers joined the team by the recommendation from their friends and former colleagues and we have a reward for this
    • A nice bonus if you accept our offer quickly

    # 2 Independence

    • from the office location or office conditions because it's only up to you where you want to work from - home, office, co-working or outdoors in the woods. The only requirement - fast and reliable internet. At the same time, our engineers do not work evenings or weekends: we focus on your local timezone
    • from any annoyance or big team buzz - we are the community of professional engineers, valuing each others' time and effort
    • from corruption and bureaucracy - we operate in an honest and competitive environment and we are one of the AWS's top 10 key partners.

    # 3 Professional Development

    • Work with innovative Silicon Valley companies and traditional American companies at the cutting edge of digital transformation
    • We work with the newest technologies in AWS cloud and open-source tools, Jira, Confluence, Lucidchart, Slack
    • Constant practice at writing and speaking in English

    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª –≤–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤: –º—ã –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑—É–µ–º –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º—å—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∏;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ï–†–ê–ú –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–µ–π (–Ω–∞—à–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤ 11 —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º –≤ 30 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö);
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  147. DevOps engineer (AWS) ("EPAM Systems, Inc.", –ù–æ–≤–æ—Å–∏–±–∏—Ä—Å–∫) [ 2021-08-25 ]
    ...–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ; –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø...

    –ú—ã –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏–º –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ ‚Äì –æ—Ç –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞ –∏ –¥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–∞. –° 1993 –≥–æ–¥–∞ EPAM –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –ø—Ä–∏–¥—É–º—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å, –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç—ã, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–µ–Ω—è—é—Ç –º–∏—Ä. –ß—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å, –≤ —á–µ–º —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω—É–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–∞–≤—Ç—Ä–∞, –º—ã —Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–º –∑–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä—è–µ–º –∏—Ö –≤ —Å–≤–æ—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ —É—á–∏–º—Å—è –∏ –Ω–∞–∫–∞–ø–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –æ–ø—ã—Ç. –£—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –ï–†–ê–ú –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ: –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∏ –∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã, —É–Ω–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω—ã —Ç—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã–º –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏—è–º –∏ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω—è–º –∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–µ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ.

    –ú—ã –∏—â–µ–º DevOps-–∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞ –¥–ª—è —É—Å–∏–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ —Å –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–≤–∞–π–¥–µ—Ä–æ–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ç–µ–ª–µ–∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å–ª—É–≥. –ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –≤–∏–¥–µ–æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–¥ iOS –∏ Android, Windows Native, –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏–º data-–ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞—è end-to-end —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è. DevOps –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä—ã –≤ —Ä–∞–º–∫–∞—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–æ–π –º–∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã –≤–∏–¥–µ–æ—Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –∏–∑ –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—É—é —Å—Ä–µ–¥—É AWS.

    –¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π —Å—Ç–µ–∫: Linux, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Ansible, Grafana, Prometheus.

    –û–ë–Ø–ó–ê–ù–ù–û–°–¢–ò:

    • –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏-–ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∏—Å—Ç–∞–º–∏, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –±–∞–∑ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞, —Ç—Ä–∞–±–ª—à—É—Ç–∏–Ω–≥, –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥ –∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –û–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è —Ä—É—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤;
    • –ò–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –≤–µ–± - —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ –≤—Å–µ—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –≤—Å–ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º;
    • –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –Ω–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–æ—á–Ω–æ–µ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã;
    • –°—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ —Å—Ä–µ–¥ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–∞

    –¢–†–ï–ë–û–í–ê–ù–ò–Ø:

    • –û–ø—ã—Ç –∞–¥–º–∏–Ω–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤–æ–≤ Linux (Ubuntu, RHEL –∏ CentOS) –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤—ã—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ CI/CD (Jenkins);
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è AWS –∏ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ (EC2, RDS, NLB/ALB, ASG, CloudWatch);
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏: Ansible, Terraform.
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker, Kubernetes;
    • –û–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ Prometheus, Grafana;
    • –ó–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –±–∞–∑–∞–º–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (Cassandra, MySQL).

    –ú–´ –ü–†–ï–î–õ–ê–ì–ê–ï–ú:

    • –†–∞–±–æ—Ç—É —Å –Ω–æ–≤–µ–π—à–∏–º–∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º–∏ –∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞—Ö –∏–∑ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–µ–π (Life Science, E-commerce, –±–∏–æ–∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏–∫–∞, GameDev, Capital Markets –∏ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö);
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–µ –Ω–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ;
    • –û–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä—è–º–æ –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–µ. –ü—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø –∫ 7000+ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –¥–µ–ª–∏–≤–µ—Ä–∏-–º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –ë–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –∫–ª—É–±—ã –≤ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö;
    • –£—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏–µ –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞—Ö –º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–≤–æ–π –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª –≤–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤: –º—ã –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑—É–µ–º –º–∏—Ç–∞–ø—ã –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –Ω–∞ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã—Ö –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–≥–ª–∞—à–∞–µ–º —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤, —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏–≤–∞–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º—å—é–Ω–∏—Ç–∏;
    • –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞—Ö –ï–†–ê–ú –≤ –†–æ—Å—Å–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞ –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–µ–π (–Ω–∞—à–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å –≤ 11 —Ä–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞—Ö –∏ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —á–µ–º –≤ 30 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö);
    • –ì–∏–±–∫–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ;
    • –î–ú–° —Å–æ —Å—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–µ–π —Å –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã;
    • –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Ç–µ–π —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤.


  148. –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –∞—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä ("–õ–ê–ù–ò–¢", –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞) [ 2021-08-25 ]
    ... —Ç.–¥.; –î–ª—è —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã - –æ—Ñ–∏—Å—ã –≤ —...

    –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è ¬´–û–ù–õ–ê–ù–¢–ê¬ª –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –≤ –ì—Ä—É–ø–ø—É –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–π ¬´–õ–ê–ù–ò–¢¬ª. –° 2008 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã–µ —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ OnCloud.ru, —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–ª—É–∞—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ –ò–¢-–∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–∏–Ω–≥–∞: Service desk, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –ò–¢-–∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–π–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—Å–ª—É–∂–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, DevOps.

    –°–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–Ω–æ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º TAdviser, CNews Analytics –∏ –†–ë–ö, OnCloud.ru –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –≤ —Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏–Ω–≥ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—á–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–≤–∞–π–¥–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –†–§.
